abstract.t: This document describes a profile of the Sieve extension fornotifications, to allow notifications to be sent over the SIPMESSAGE.Conventions Used in this DocumentThe key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT","SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in thisdocument are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119 [RFC2119].
